text:
@DrOz No confusion, you said a number of deaths would be acceptable in order to revive the economy.
Pick which one of your own kids you’d prefer to see die from #Covid19, because that’s what you’re talking about, some real parents’ real children dying needlessly to placate Trump’s plan
